page.title: 02"D" Block General (Cont.)
page.content:
The moor is part of the Morton moor and the Bingley moor.The canal belongs to the Leeds to Liverpool canal.In recent tests,we found that the canal was slightly polluted,but it does seem to be getting worse little by little. The only towns that the canal goes through in our area are Micklethwaite and Riddlesden.There is the A650 route road going through Crossflatts. Ryshworth Middle School is the main school in this area.It was built in 1973 and can hold 480 pupils. Being situated near Bradford and Leeds,it is slowly becoming a good place for housing and business.
{CHRISTOPHER LESLIE { DAVID OXTABY { CARL SPENCER { JULY 1985
